articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly Built Wisong Scientists Residential District
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly Built Wisong Scientists Residential District
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the newly built Wisong Scientists Residential District.
					 The residential district consists of multi-storeyed apartment houses of 24 blocks, schools, hospital, nursery, kindergarten, public buildings including various welfare service facilities and parks.
					
					 After being briefed on the district before a map showing its bird's-eye view, he overlooked it.
					
					 Watching the exterior of the apartment houses and public buildings nicely decorated with diverse color tiles, he was very pleased to see them. He said they looked very attractive, presenting fantastic scenery.
					
					 He learned in detail about the construction of the district, looking round various places of the district including apartment houses, primary school, junior secondary school, pharmacy, polyclinic, the Wisong Health Complex and solar heated greenhouse.
					
					 He noted that not only the flats looked cozy and convenient for settlers but they are fitted with complete sets of quality furniture and fixtures, adding that scientists would not need to bring in anything for living if all flats would have color TV sets, quilts and household articles provided by the party.
					
					 On the same day he also visited the newly built Natural Energy Institute of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 Going round various places of the institute, he praised the builders for constructing it qualitatively as intended by the party.
					
					 He, in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, extended thanks to the service personnel and builders who completed the residential district at the best level within the period the party promised to scientists.
					
					 He said that the construction of the Wisong Scientists Residential District was not aimed to demonstrate the architecture of the country but to enable scientists to put their hearts and soul into scientific researches without any inconvenience.
					
					 He said: "Our scientists are patriots who are devoting all their lives to building a rich and powerful nation, convinced that though there is no frontier in science, they have a socialist motherland and are under the care of the mother party. There is nothing to spare for them. It is necessary to project and treat scientists preferentially and always take care of them."
					
					 He proposed building more apartment houses and public buildings like the Wisong Scientists Residential District in the Unjong science area to turn it into a world-class science city. And he took necessary steps with loving care.
					
					 Expressing expectation and belief that all the scientists and officials of the State Academy of Sciences would make a positive contribution to the cause of building a rich and powerful nation by registering signal scientific and technological successes with a high ideal and beautiful dream, he had a photo session with the scientists who will move into the new apartment houses in front of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the academy.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Han Kwang Sang and Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from S. M. Mironov, chairman of "A Just Russia", on Oct. 6.
					 The chairman in the message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of "A Just Russia" and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK made due contributions to building the DPRK, a socialist state, while covering protracted and arduous path, he said, adding:
					
					 The WPK has long led the working people in the DPRK in their drive for creating new life.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War, the Korean people beat back the invasion of the enemies and protected the independence of the country and the gains of the revolution under the guidance of the party.
					
					 "A Just Russia" and the WPK have good relations, he noted, stressing that "A Just Russia" is making efforts for further development of these relations.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Uruguayan Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Uruguayan Party Leader
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from Ruben Maria Vera, chairperson of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay, on Oct. 9.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the WPK which brought about epochal changes in the history of the Korean revolution and made tangible contributions to the anti-imperialist struggle in the whole world on behalf of the Uruguayan comrades on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 The foundation of the WPK was a precious legacy left by President Kim Il Sung to the new generation of the DPRK, the message said.
					
					 It expressed the belief that the WPK would continue to achieve successes in the struggle for Korea's reunification, extending sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Figures
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Figures
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from National Chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party Renato Ravello and its International Secretary Ricardo Alemao Abreu on Oct. 9.
					 The message extended fraternal greetings to Kim Jong Un and all members of the WPK on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of its foundation.
					
					 The message said that the world people firmly believe that socialism is the only way out now that the crisis of the capitalist system has reached the extremes.
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party values and highly estimates the friendship between the Brazilian Communist Party and the WPK and the solidarity between the peoples of the two countries and celebrate this significant day for the working people of the DPRK, the message added.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National President of Party for Free Motherland of Brazil
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National President of Party for Free Motherland of Brazil
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres, national president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, on Oct. 8.
					 The message said:
					
					 We celebrate the 69th anniversary of the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung on October 10.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un is leading in the van the powerful WPK which guided to victories the heroic struggle against the occupation of Japan, 1950-1953 Korean war against the invasion of the U.S., the struggle for defending independence and sovereignty of the country to let the Korean people enjoy happiness in the free and prosperous country and the efforts of the Korean people for the development of economy and society of the DPRK.
					
					 The Party for Free Motherland of Brazil supports the struggle of brave and militant WPK which is simultaneously enforcing the politics for the economic development and prosperity and the Songun politics for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent and defense capability to cope with increased threat of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Independence and self-reliance in defence are the only way to defend socialist Korea, the country where the people are the master of their destiny.
					
					 We support the will of the WPK to hold dialogue for independence, peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 We express the belief that the WPK will defend gains of socialism, boost the economic development and lead the Korean people to victory for only one Korea.
					
					 Long live socialist Korea and heroic WPK!
					
					 Down with Imperialism!

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Vietnamese Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Vietnamese Ambassador to DPRK
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Pham Viet Hung who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Sweden
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Sweden
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju Monday sent a congratulatory message to Stefan Lofven upon his appointment as prime minister of Sweden. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him success in his responsible work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Gives Reception
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez hosted a reception at his embassy Tuesday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there on invitation were Member of the Political Bureau and Secretary Kang Sok Ju, Vice Department Director Pak Kun Gwang and other officials of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Staff members of the embassy were on hand.
					
					 German Hermin Ferras Alvarez in his speech said that the Cuban people are highly estimating the successes achieved by the Korean people under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people are the closest comrades-in-arms and brothers of the Cuban people fighting against the U.S. imperialists, common enemy, in the same trench, he stressed, adding:
					
					 Cuba will always stand by the Korean comrades in the struggle for the sovereignty of the country and its reunification and socialist construction.
					
					 He hoped the DPRK would successfully attain all its goals under the guidance of the WPK.
					
					 Cuba will always stand with Korean comrades struggling for the sovereignty and reunification of the country and socialist construction.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju noted that Cuban people significantly celebrated the founding anniversary of the WPK together with the Korean people every year, an expression of stand of the Cuban party and government based on obligation of comradeship.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is paying particular attention to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il together with the Cuban leaders, he said, adding:
					
					 The party, government and people of Cuba have extended invariable support and encouragement to the WPK and the Korean people in their revolutionary cause of building a thriving nation and achieving the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The WPK would always win victories only as the great party of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as it is led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Conservatory
articles.content:
Russian Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Conservatory
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin and his embassy officials visited Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory Tuesday on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					 The visitors went round different parts of the conservatory, including the room dedicated to its history and lecture and music halls.
					
					 The ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visit Various Places
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visit Various Places
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Chonji Lubricant Factory Tuesday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Members of the corps laid bouquets before the mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round different places of the factory.
					
					 Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy, said:
					
					 This factory is a modern one where Kim Jong Il's far-reaching plan has been translated into reality.
					
					 All production processes are automated and quality of products is excellent.
					
					 I hope this factory would achieve greater successes in all work.
					
					 Waleed Elsayed Mohamed Ahmed, military attache of the Egyptian embassy, said that the visit provided an opportunity to know well about the Korean people's spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 They also toured the Chollima Tile Factory.

articles.title: Egyptian Businessmen Leave
articles.content:
Egyptian Businessmen Leave
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Naguib Sawiris, executive chairman of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt, and his party returned home Tuesday.

articles.title: 6th National IT Success Exhibition of University Students Closes
articles.content:
6th National IT Success Exhibition of University Students Closes
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The 6th National IT Success Exhibition of University Students closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Tuesday.
					 On display there were many inventions and IT products, presented by youth league organizations and students at universities and colleges across the country.
					
					 Highly estimated were more than 300 inventions conducive to putting the national economy on Juche, modern and CNC basis and improving the livelihood of the people.
					
					 Among those present at the closing ceremony were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, and Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology proved successful in the field of universities and Haeju Medical College in the field of colleges.
					
					 Pyongyang came top in provincial standings and South Hamgyong Province placed first.

articles.title: Laser Surgical Instrument Developed
articles.content:
Laser Surgical Instrument Developed
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Friendship Hospital in the DPRK has recently developed a laser surgical instrument for treating such skin diseases as angioma cutis and chromatopathy. 
					 This instrument helps remove abnormal tissues smoothly, having little effect on normal tissue. It makes it possible to shorten the time of operation, without causing bleeding or leaving scar. 
					
					 It can be used in not only dermatological department but also other specialized departments of hospital, which are in need of micromanipulation, and applicable to the treatment of incurable diseases.

articles.title: New Fish Feed Additives Made in DPRK
articles.content:
New Fish Feed Additives Made in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Microbiological Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK succeeded in making new fish feed additives.
					 Among them are addictives made of dextran produced by microbe and extracted from a special kind of yeast.
					
					 Those addictives help promote digestion and prevent diseases and ensure the growth and breeding of sea creature.

articles.title: U.S. Branded as Chieftain of Nuclear Proliferation
articles.content:
U.S. Branded as Chieftain of Nuclear Proliferation
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary brands the United States as chieftain of nuclear proliferation and nuclear arms race in the world. 
					 The Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty framework is now collapsing entirely due to the U.S. wrong behavior, the commentary points out, saying:
					
					 The U.S. nuclear policy is for realizing world domination with nukes as its basic means and with the help of the NPT. Accordingly, the collapse of the NPT framework may spoil the U.S. policy of nuclear supremacy. 
					
					 The U.S. has regarded nukes as almighty means for threatening and stamping out the sovereignty of other countries, and its nuclear policy for world domination remains unchanged.
					
					 The deceptive and unfair nuclear policy of the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear possessor, and its ceaseless nuclear blackmail compel the victim nations to move toward enervating the nuclear supremacy and NPT the U.S. depends on. 
					
					 That's why the U.S. does not hesitate to blackmail with nukes the anti-U.S. and independent, non-nuclear weapon states in an attempt to block such movement. 
					
					 The U.S. moves for updating nukes make other nuclear weapons states put spurs to nuclear arms race. After all, they will spoil the hope of humankind for global denuclearization.

articles.title: U.S., Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
U.S., Worst Human Rights Abuser
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- It was reported that 18-year-old black Vonderrit Myers Jr. was killed by an off-duty white police officer in St. Louis, Missouri State, the U.S. at night on Oct. 8.
					 The murder sparked off an immediate outcry against segregation in St. Louis and its surrounding areas.
					
					 It gives a glimpse of human rights situation in the U.S. where the "equality of all people" is called for.
					
					 In 2012, a policeman and night patrol seized black men as "suspects" and forced them into "confessions" by brutal tortures in Chicago, which gave a shock to all communities in the U.S.
					
					 Last year, a white policeman shot dead a black boy on his way home in Florida. But the Florida State Court sentenced the policeman "not guilty" after ruling that the gunshot was for "self-defensive", which made people aghast.
					
					 What is more serious is that such brutal killing of blacks has been committed one after another in the U.S. with the connivance of and under the patronage of the administration.
					
					 The U.S. administration also brutally suppressed a demonstration staged in protest against the murder of a young black by a white policeman in Ferguson City, Missouri State in August this year.
					
					 All these facts go to prove that the "equality of all people" called for by the U.S. is nothing but an empty talk and its loudmouthed "protection of human rights" a veil to cover up its poor human rights records.
					
					 The U.S. is well advised to mind its own human rights situation before saying this or that about other's "human rights issue."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing North-South Declarations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing North-South Declarations
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- At a time when the expectation and concern for the improved inter-Korean relations is growing higher than ever before at home and abroad, it presents itself as a very important matter to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, reunification programme common to the nation, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Tuesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The past days prove the fact that the implementation of the north-south declarations is a vital and urgent issue in the development of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the north-south declarations are sincerely implemented, all problems including not only the reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south but also the issue of achieving peace and cooperation will be smoothly solved in conformity with the demand and aspiration of the compatriots.
					
					 It is beyond doubt that the inter-Korean relations will be turned into the relations of trust, unity and reunification if the north and the south respect and sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, its practical programme, 
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the key to solve the issue of inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is quite natural that it is impossible to build trust while disregarding the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration agreed upon by the top leaders of the north and the south.
					
					 The past history of the inter-Korean relations show that if the north and the south are faithful to the joint declarations, they can pool their efforts to open up the road of reunification, but if they oppose and violate them, their relations would roll into a pit of confrontation and catastrophe.
					
					 It is a steadfast stand and will of the DPRK government to regard the historic north-south declarations as invariable milestone and to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity with the joint efforts of the north and the south.

articles.title: U.S. Has No Face to Call for "Human Rights": Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Has No Face to Call for "Human Rights": Minju Joson
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- It was recently reported that a middle school student in a city of North Carolina State of America fired at his schoolmate after quarreling for a while, injuring him. 
					 This gun-related violence clearly shows the corrupt U.S. society riddled with misanthropic idea, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 Gun-related crimes have become an incurable cancer in the American society, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is common practice in the U.S. that residents do not hesitate to commit murder and violence for their own interests. 
					
					 U.S. President Obama said at a recent meeting of group of black lawmakers in Washington that many young Americans groundlessly become objects of violence owing to the racial distrust existing in the U.S. society. 
					
					 Obama's open recognition of vices in the American society may be appreciated. But he is seriously mistaken in judging the cause.
					
					 In other countries, too, there are people of different races getting along together but such gun-related crimes can hardly be seen.
					
					 The root cause is the rotten U.S. politics and Yankee culture.
					
					 The American politicians are wizards of swindle and trickery as they paint their corrupt social system with "respect and defence of human rights". 
					
					 The U.S. is well advised to mind its own business before speaking ill of others.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Website
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania on its website "Juche Idea" on October 8.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious President Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Opens in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Opens in Mongolia
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia Show was opened in Ulan Bator, Mongolia on October 7 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venue of the show were photos dealing with the exploits performed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kimjongilias, flowers praising the great man, presented a spectacular view with the letters "October 10, Celebration" and "69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" in the background.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were figures of the government, political party and organizations including the Mongolian ministries of Industry and Agriculture, Culture, Sports and Tourism and Foreign Affairs and Trade, the National Democratic Party of Mongolia, the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia and masses.
					
					 A vice-minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism in his speech said that the show manifests well the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries favorably developing day by day.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will grow stronger along with Kimjongilia blooming in the land of Mongolia, he added.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Observed by Bulgarian and Iranian Papers
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Observed by Bulgarian and Iranian Papers
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian and Iranian papers carried special write-ups with photos of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The October issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Iskra carried articles with several titles under the headline of "69th founding anniversary of the WPK, victorious course of the Korean revolution".
					
					 The paper in the articles wrote in detail that President Kim Il Sung gave origin to the Korean revolution by forming the Down-with-Imperialism Union on October 17, 1926 and founded the WPK on October 10, 1945 by pushing forward the preparations for founding the revolutionary party in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 The paper noted in the article titled "Road of the WPK":
					
					 The WPK has covered hard and glorious path in the protracted period after its foundation.
					
					 The party played a vanguard role in building a new country after liberation. It guided the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists to victory and built socialism on the debris in a short period after the war.
					
					 It also built a powerful military power to reliably defend the sovereignty of the country from the aggression of foreign forces and achieved great successes in promoting the well-being of the people.
					
					 The history of the WPK is one of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The October 2nd issue of the Iranian newspaper The Iran News introduced the nearly 70 year-long history of the WPK.

articles.title: Institutions and Bodies of Different Countries Praise WPK
articles.content:
Institutions and Bodies of Different Countries Praise WPK
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Institutions and bodies of different countries on Oct. 2 and 4 posted on websites articles on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK and the 88th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador and Juche Youth Group in Ecuador in articles titled "DIU and WPK", etc. said that the WPK, a guiding force, has its historical roots in the DIU.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship in articles titled "For realizing people's dream", etc. praised the feats of the WPK, the mother party that protects the interests of the people and serves them.
					
					 The AntiÔºçImperialist Forum of Germany in an article titled "Ever-victorious WPK" illustrated with a photo of Monument to Party Founding said as follows:
					
					 The WPK is a party with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as a guiding ideology the essence of which is the Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 The party has achieved its steel-like unity and cohesion.
					
					 Thanks to President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the party, the foundation for the unity and cohesion was laid and it was consolidated by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The party is enjoying the absolute support and trust of the people and the Korean people are trusting in the party, calling it the mother party.
					
					 Thanks to the politics of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, which is characterized by his love for the people and his policy of giving priority to the people, there sprang up modern apartment houses and cultural and entertainment establishments for the people everywhere and radical changes are taking place in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The party will always emerge victorious.

articles.title: Figures of Angola and Myanmar Praise WPK
articles.content:
Figures of Angola and Myanmar Praise WPK
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Figures of Angola and Myanmar on Oct. 6 issued statements in celebration of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th anniversary of the founding of the WPK.
					 Carlos Alberto Pinto de Sousa, president of the Angola Doctor Association, said that the WPK is the most powerful party that achieved its steel-like unity and cohesion.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, united the party in one thought and one purpose and this was further consolidated by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 So the party could successfully carry out the cause of socialism even when communist parties and workers' parties in different countries suffered division and collapse.
					
					 The party with supreme leader Kim Jong Un in the van who has great personality and qualification is fully displaying its might as an invincible party guiding the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The general director of a publishing house of Myanmar said that thanks to the correct leadership of the party, the Korean people could keep to the victorious road for the last decades without any turns and twists.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the WPK and the Korean people to build a thriving nation and realize the cause of national reunification, carrying forward the ideology and cause of the President and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Bodies of DR Congo Back DPRK Proposal to Found Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo
articles.content:
Bodies of DR Congo Back DPRK Proposal to Found Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association and the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo issued a joint statement on Oct. 6 on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the cause of national reunification all his life.
					
					 The President set forth the three principals of national reunification, the five-point policy for national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for the reunification of the country, etc. in order to achieve national reunification. A particular mention should be made of the fact that he put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo on Oct. 10, 1980.
					
					 No matter how the situation changed, the validity of the above-said proposals for Korea's reunification advanced by the President has been proved century after century.
					
					 We who are desirous of independent reunification of Korea declare as follows on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal.
					
					 1. We are confident that the proposal advanced by the President is the most reasonable one for the reunification supported by all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 2. We once again call upon the world progressives to wholeheartedly support the struggle of the Korean people for rejecting foreign forces' interference and reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 3. We demand the U.S. stop moving to stifle the DPRK at once and pull its forces out of south Korea and also demand the south Korean authorities make substantial efforts to reunify the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: British Bodies Back Revolutionary, Anti-imperialist Stand of DPRK
articles.content:
British Bodies Back Revolutionary, Anti-imperialist Stand of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- We wholeheartedly support the revolutionary and anti-imperialist stand of the DPRK that unless the U.S. stops pursuing its hostile policy towards the DPRK and threatening it with nukes, the DPRK will neither give up its nuclear deterrent nor barter them even for a colossal amount of money.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK said this in a joint statement on Oct. 6.
					
					 The statement continued:
					
					 The U.S. is pulling up socialist Korea over its nuclear deterrent and is also resorting to the vicious moves to defame the country with fabricated information.
					
					 The U.S. strategy towards the DPRK is to stifle it through the "human rights" campaign in case it fails to put pressure upon the DPRK over its nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK had no other option but to have access to nuclear deterrent because the U.S. has threatened the DPRK with nukes for more than half a century, and its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force was an indispensable option of the DPRK reflecting the supreme interests of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The U.S. is resorting to a base move to defame the DPRK through the "human rights" campaign and disintegrate the popular masses-centered socialist system from within, forcing the country to disarm itself.
					
					 The U.S. had better be well aware of the fact that the DPRK will never stop keeping to the road of independence, Songun and socialism and its frantic racket for putting pressure upon the DPRK will make it take a tougher attitude.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Brazil
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was published in pamphlet by the Asa Copias Publishing House of Brazil on October 8.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are a mighty political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the arms and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly meets the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre la zona de viviendas de cientificos Wisong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre la zona de viviendas de cientificos Wisong
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la zona de viviendas de cientificos Wisong, construida nuevamente.
					La zona esta formada por 24 apartamentos de varias plantas, escuelas, hospital, guarderia, jardin infantil, edificios publicos como establecimientos de servicios publicos y parques.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de la zona, contemplo el panorama de ella.
					
					Al ver el exterior de viviendas y edificios publicos adornados con azulejos de varios colores, se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que el panorama es maravilloso.
					
					Se entero en detalles del estado de construccion recorriendo varios puntos de la zona incluyendo las viviendas, la escuela primaria, la escuela secundaria basica, la farmacia, la policlinica, el centro de servicios de higiene Wisong y el invernadero solar.
					
					Dijo que las viviendas fueron construidas comodas y amuebladas de calidad y prosiguio que cuando en estas casas se coloquen la TV en color, la colcha y los utensilios preparados por el Partido, los cientificos podran vivir sin tener nada que traer en la mudanza.
					
					El mismo dia, Kim Jong Un recorrio el Instituto de Energia Natural de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias construido junto con la zona de viviendas.
					
					Pasando revista a varios lugares del instituto, evaluo que la construccion se llevo a cabo con calidad conforme al proposito del partido.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento en nombre del Comite Central del PTC a los militares del EPC y los constructores quienes terminaron la construccion de viviendas en el maximo nivel y en el plazo prometido por el Partido a los cientificos.
					
					El objetivo de esta obra no esta en hacer alarde de la arquitectura coreana sino hacer a los cientificos dedicarse a la investigacion cientifica sin ninguna incomodidad, senalo.
					
					Continuo que los cientificos coreanos son los patriotas quienes dedican toda la vida a la construccion de una patria prospera con la conviccion de que no hay fronteras en la ciencia, pero ellos tienen la patria socialista y el regazo del partido madre donde viviran siempre.
					
					Diciendo que no hay nada que escatimar para ellos, instruyo tratarlos con preferencia y atenderlos siempre.
					
					Propuso convertir en la zona de cientificos de Unjong nuevas viviendas como las recien construidas para convertir esta ciudad en la cientifica de talla mundial y tomo las medidas correspondientes.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que todos los cientificos y funcionarios de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias contribuiran a la causa de construccion de una patria prospera con los exitos cientificos y tecnicos y se fotografio junto con los cientificos a mudarse a nuevas viviendas ante las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il levantadas en esa academia.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Han Kwang Sang y Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 69o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el embajador cubano en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 14 un banquete en su sede diplomatica. 
					Fueron invitados el miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kang Sok Ju, el subjefe de departamento Pak Kun Gwang y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada cubana. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez dijo que el pueblo cubano aprecia mucho los exitos alcanzados por el pueblo coreano bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y agrego que el pueblo coreano es el mas intimo companero de armas y hermano del pueblo cubano que lucha en la misma trinchera contra el imperialismo norteamericano, enemigo comun. 
					
					Subrayo que Cuba estara para siempre junto con los companeros coreanos que luchan por la soberania y la reunificacion de la patria y la construccion socialista.
					
					Deseo que bajo la guia del PTC la RPDC  alcance con exitos sus metas. 
					
					Kang Sok Ju, en su discurso, subrayo que cada ano el pueblo cubano celebra significativamente junto con los coreanos el dia de fundacion del PTC, lo cual es la expresion de la posicion del partido y gobierno cubanos basada en la obligacion camaraderil. 
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un presta atencion especial al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos partidos y  paises preparadas por los Generalisimos junto con los lideres cubanos, dijo.
					
					Menciono que el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba expresan invariable apoyo y solidaridad con la causa revolucionaria del partido y pueblo coreanos por construir un Estado prospero y reunificar la patria de manera independiente. 
					
					Concluyo que el PTC saldra siempre victorioso como gran partido kimilsungista-kimjongilista gracias a tener en su supremo puesto al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: EE.UU. es autor de proliferacion nuclear, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. es autor de proliferacion nuclear, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual de este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica a Estados Unidos de autor de proliferacion nuclear y de carrera armamentista nuclear del mundo. 
					El imperio destruye el sistema de No Proliferacion Nuclear, revela el comentario y continua:
					
					La politica nuclear de EE.UU. es la de hegemonia mundial que toma las armas nucleares como medio principal y se garantiza por el Tratado de No Proliferacion Nuclear. Pues, en el caso de invalidarse el Tratado de No Proliferacion Nuclear, se acabara la superioridad nuclear de EE.UU. aunque este cuente con muchas armas nucleares. 
					
					Es invariable la ambicion agresiva y dominacionista de EE.UU. que considera las armas nucleares como medio todopoderoso para ejercer la amenaza y chantaje y exterminar la soberania de otros paises. 
					
					La enganosa e injusta politica nuclear y el incesante chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., mayor poseedor de armas nuclear del mundo, obligan a sus victimas dirigirse a eliminar la superioridad nuclear de EE.UU. y el Tratado de No Proliferacion Nuclear. 
					
					EE.UU. lo teme mas que nada. 
					
					Por lo tanto, no vacila en ejercer la amenaza y chantaje nucleares a los paises independientes, antiyanquis y desnuclearizados a fin de arrebatar sus derechos. 
					
					La modernizacion de armas nucleares de EE.UU. incita a los paises con armas nucleares  modernizar sus propias armas nucleares. En fin de cuentas, se hace cada dia mas lejos el dia de realizar la aspiracion de la humanidad a la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero.

articles.title: EE.UU. viola derechos humanos
articles.content:
EE.UU. viola derechos humanos
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, ocurrio otra vez un caso de que Estados Unidos se entrega a la violacion de DDHH con la mascara de "defensor de DDHH" revelando asi su naturaleza criminal a todo el mundo.
					Por la noche del pasado dia 8, en la ciudad de Louis del Estado de Missouri el muchacho negro de 18 anos de edad Vonderrit Myers Jr. fue fusilado por un policia blanco.
					
					Tan pronto como ocurriera este caso, se libraron en esta ciudad y sus alrededores las manifestaciones de protesta contra la discriminacion racial.
					
					Esta atrocidad no es la primera ocurrida en EE.UU. donde aboga por la "igualdad de todo el pueblo".
					
					En los ultimos anos, en EE.UU. los negros sufren muertos y violencias por ser otra raza de color.
					
					En 2012, en la ciudad de Chicago un policia y el cuerpo de patrulla nocturna capturaron a los hombres negros y les ejercieron la tortura barbara para recibir a fuerzas la confesion, lo que consterno a las personas.
					
					En el ano pasado, en el Estado de Florida un nino negro quien iba a la casa murio por el policia blanco. Pero, el tribunal del Estado declaro al policia la inculpabilidad porque el hizo la "defensa justa".
					
					Esta sentencia injusta exploto en todo el territorio estadounidense una gran manifestacion de protesta.
					
					El problema es que estos asesinatos salvajes y los actos discriminadores contra los negros son tolerados y amparados por la administracion norteamericana.
					
					Tambien cuando un muchacho negro fue fusilado por un policia blanco en agosto pasado en la ciudad de Ferguson del Estado de Missouri, la administracion norteamericana respondio con la represion brutal a los manifestantes de protesta sin castigar al asesino ni tomar las medidas necesarias para que no ocurrieran los asesinatos de discriminacion racial.
					
					Todos los hechos prueban claramente que la "defensa de DDHH" de que habla EE.UU. no pasa de ser un engano para ocultar su vil naturaleza.
					
					Antes de hablar del "problema de DDHH" de alguien, EE.UU. debe limpiar primero su nariz.
